prod_short_desc: Hop aboard My First Train Set for beginning builder fun!
prod_long_desc:
Introduce your child to the world of trains and building with the LEGO® DUPLO® My First Train Set. Create the colorful steam train with sound effects, a passenger wagon, station with ticket window, fueling pump and signal. With a lot of DUPLO bricks and track, it's the perfect set for budding builders and hours of train-themed creative play. Requires 3 AA (1.5V) batteries (not included). Includes train driver and child DUPLO figures.
Includes 2 LEGO® DUPLO® figures: train driver and child
Features a steam train with real sound effects, passenger wagon, station with ticket window and clock, fueling pump, signal, DUPLO bricks and a lot of tracks.
DUPLO bricks include decorated bricks featuring flowers and a goat
Load the figures aboard the steam train and take a ride!
Fuel up the train and chug down the tracks!
Buy a ticket at the station
Tracks do not conduct electricity and therefore are not compatible with LEGO 9V trains
For use with DUPLO trains only
Requires 3 AA (1.5V) batteries (not included)
DUPLO products are specially designed to be fun and safe for younger hands
Steam train measures over 3" high, 5" long and 2" wide
Passenger wagon measures over 3" high, 6" long and 2" wide
Train station measures over 7" high, 7" long and 2" wide
Train track measures over 68” long and 29” wide when built.
